Name: Mujer Verde
Ingredients: 15 ml Green Chartreuse (or alternative herbal liqueur)
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lime zest twist.
Express lime zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: The name means 'Green Lady'... and she packs a Chartreuse punch.
History: Discovered in 2006 at Absinthe, San Francisco, where 'D Mexican' resurrected this drink from his hometown of Guadalajara.
Nutrition: One serving of Mujer Verde contains 199 calories
